mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ORDER( ORDER_ID, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_ADDR, ORDER_ADDR_D, ORDER_ZIPCODE, ORDER_RECEIVER, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_TOTAL, USER_STATUS, USER_ID) VALUES( #{order_id}, SYSDATE, #{order_addr}, #{order_addr_d}, #{order_zipcode}, #{order_receiver}, #{order_phone}, #{order_total}, 1, #{user_id} )

INSERT INTO USERORDER_DETAIL(ORDER_DETAIL_ID, USER_ORDER_CNT, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID) SELECT ORDERDETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, c.CART_PRODUCT_QTY, #{order_id}, c.PRODUCT_ID, c.USER_ID FROM CART c where USER_ID = #{user_id}

INSERT INTO PAYMENT p( p.BUYER_ADDR, p.BUYER_NAME, p.BUYER_POSTCODE, p.BUYER_TEL, p.IAMPORT_IMP_UID, p.ALLSUM) SELECT u.ORDER_ADDR ||' '||u.ORDER_ADDR_D as ADDR, u.ORDER_RECEIVER, u.ORDER_ZIPCODE, u.ORDER_PHONE, u.ORDER_ID, u.ORDER_TOTAL FROM USER_ORDER u WHERE u.ORDER_ID= #{order_id}
INSERT INTO USERORDER_DETAIL(ORDER_DETAIL_ID, USER_ORDER_CNT, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID) values (ORDERDETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cart_product_qty}, #{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{user_id})
